Array.name: Scroll of a Sleeping Relic
Array.description: A scroll that can find a relic sleeping somewhere.

Array.name: Scroll of a Shining Relic
Array.description: A scroll that can find a fairly well-known relic.

Array.name: Scroll of a Historical Relic
Array.description: A scroll that can find a historically very valuable relic.

Array.name: Dawn Forest Treasure Scroll
Array.description: A scroll written in deep sorrow and the pain of betrayal.

Array.name: Granisado's Treasure Scroll
Array.description: A scroll written in intense cold and frozen peace.

Array.name: Pitier's Treasure Scroll
Array.description: A scroll written immersed in dry sand winds and long yearning.

Array.name: Lukuma's Treasure Scroll
Array.description: A scroll written in endless greed and the blessing of despair.

Array.name: Old Scroll of Relic
Array.description: A scroll that can find a relic sleeping somewhere.

Array.name: Medal Scroll
Array.description: Scroll about the medal awarded to the exceptional wizards of Granisado.

Array.name: Frozen Scroll
Array.description: Scroll about the sheet music frozen in the cold for a long time.

Array.name: Jar Scroll
Array.description: Scroll about the jar adorned with Pitier traditional patterns.

Array.name: Pipi's Scroll
Array.description: Scroll about the blanket filled with precious memories of Pipi.

Array.name: Tears Scroll
Array.description: Scroll about the tears that capture the fear of the golden, splendid city.
